S04n292:1: vajragarbha āha - yo'yaṃ bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau suparipūrṇabodhisattvamārgaḥ saptamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākramati,
S04n292:24: evirbhavanto jinaputrā daśabhirupāyaprajñājñānābhinirhṛtibhirmārgāntarārambhaviśeṣairbodhisattvaḥ ṣaṣṭhyā bodhisattvabhūmeḥ saptamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimākrānta ityucyate ||
S04n292:45: tasyaivaṃ bhavati - evamapramāṇaḥ khalu punastathāgatānāmarhatāṃ samyaksaṃbuddhānāṃ viṣayo yasya na sukarā saṃkhyā kartuṃ kalpakoṭiśatasahasrairyāvadetāvadbhirapi kalpakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ |
S04n292:47: sa evaṃ supratyavekṣitajñānābhijñaḥ satatasamitamabhiyuktopāyaprajñāparibhāviteṣu mārgāntarārambhaviśeṣeṣu supratiṣṭhito bhavatyavicālyayogena ||
S04n292:50: tiṣṭhannapi niṣaṇṇo'pi śayāno'pi svapnāntaragato'pyapagatanīvaraṇaḥ sarveryāpathe sthito'virahito bhavati ebhirevaṃrūpaiḥ saṃjñāmanasikāraiḥ |
S04n292:51: tasya sarvacittotpāde daśānāṃ bodhisattvapāramitānāṃ samudāgamaparipūriḥ samudāgacchati |
S04n292:53: tathā hi sa bodhisattvaḥ sarvāṃścittotpādānutpannotpannān mahākaruṇāpūrvakān buddhadharmasamudāgamāya tathāgatajñānāya pariṇāmayati |
S04n292:54: tatra yaḥ kuśalamūlasya sattvebhya utsargo buddhajñānaṃ paryeṣamāṇasya,
S04n292:72: evamasya bhavanto jinaputrā bodhisattvasya dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya imā daśa pāramitāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante |
S04n292:77: samāsataḥ sarvabodhyaṅgikā dharmāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante ||
S04n292:78: evamukte vimukticandro bodhisattvo vajragarbhaṃ bodhisattvametadavocat - kiṃ punarbho jinaputrā asyāmeva saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgikā dharmāḥ kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante,
S04n292:80: vajragarbha āha - sarvāsu bho jinaputrā daśasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgāni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante,
S04n292:83: iyaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvabhūmiḥ prāyogikacaryāparipūraṇī ca jñānābhijñānacaryākramaṇī ca |
S04n292:84: api tu khalu punarbho jinaputrāḥ prathamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvapraṇidhānādhyālambena bodhisattvasya sarvabodhyaṅgāni kṣaṇe kṣaṇe paripūryante |
S04n292:90: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sarvabuddhadharmasamutthāpanatayā kṣaṇe kṣaṇe sarvabodhyāṅgāni paripūryante |
S04n292:92: yāni bodhisattvena prathamāṃ bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya yāvatsaptamī bodhisattvabhūmirityabhinirhṛtāni jñānābhinirhāraprayogāṅgāni,
S04n292:94: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrā dvayorlokadhātvoḥ saṃkliṣṭaviśuddhāśayaśca lokadhātorekāntapariśuddhāśayaśca lokadhātorlokāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahābhijñābalādhānāt,
S04n292:95: evameva bho jinaputra vyāmiśrapariśuddhā bodhisattvacaryāntarikā duratikramā na śakyā yathātathātikramitumanyatra mahāpraṇidhānopāyaprajñābhijñābalādhānāt |
S04n292:96: vimukticandra āha - kiṃ punarbho jinaputra saptasu bodhisattvabhūmiṣu kleśacaryāsaṃkliṣṭā bodhisattvacaryā pratyetavyā ?
S04n292:97: vajragarbha āha - prathamāmeva bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya sarvābodhisattvacaryāpagatakleśakalmāṣā bodhipariṇāmanādhipatyena pratyetavyā |
S04n292:100: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra rājā cakravartī divyaṃ hastiratnamabhirūḍhaścaturo dvīpānākramati,
S04n292:104: yadā punarmanuṣyāśrayaṃ hitvā brahmalokopapanno bhavati brāhmyavimānamabhirūḍhaḥ,
S04n292:108: evameva bhoḥ prathamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvaḥ pāramitāyānābhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran saṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti,
S04n292:111: saptasu bhūmiṣu sarvaprāyogikacaryāṃ vihāya saptamyā bhūmeraṣṭamīṃ bodhisattvabhūmimavakrānto bhavati,
S04n292:112: tadā pariśuddhaṃ bodhisattvayānamabhirūḍhaḥ sarvajagadanuvicaran sarvajagatsaṃkleśadoṣān prajānāti,
S04n292:114: asyāṃ punarbho jinaputra sapyamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena rāgādipramukhaṃ sarvakleśagaṇaṃ samatikrānto bhavati |
S04n292:115: so'syāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau caran bodhisattvo'saṃkleśāniṣkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ |
S04n292:116: tatkasmāt? asamudācārātsarvakleśānāṃ na saṃkleśa iti vaktavyaḥ |
S04n292:118: so'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvo'dhyāśayapariśuddhena kāyakarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati |
S04n292:119: adhyāśayapariśuddhena vākkarmaṇā adhyāśayapariśuddhena manaskarmaṇā samanvāgato bhavati |
S04n292:122: ye ceme daśa kuśalāḥ karmapathāḥ samyaksaṃbuddhānubhāvitāḥ,
S04n292:124: yāni laukikāni śilpasthānakarmasthānāni yānyabhinirhṛtāni pañcamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau,
S04n292:126: sa ācāryaḥ saṃmato bhavati trisāhasra mahāsāhasralokadhātau,
S04n292:129: nāsya kaścitsamo bhavatyāśayena vā prayogeṇa vā |
S04n292:130: yāni cemāni dhyānāni samādhayaḥ samapattayo'bhijñā vimokṣāśca,
S04n292:132: na ca tāvadvipākataḥ pariniṣpannāni bhavanti tadyathāpi nāma aṣṭamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya |
S04n292:133: asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya sarvacittotpādeṣu prajñopāyabhāvanābalaṃ paripūryate |
S04n292:135: so'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitaḥ san suvicitavicayaṃ ca nāma bodhisattvasamādhi samāpadyate |
S04n292:145: sa evaṃpramukhāni mahābhijñājñānamukhāni paripūrṇāni daśa samādhiśatasahasrāṇi bhūmipariśodhikāni samāpadyate ||
S04n292:146: sa eṣāṃ samādhīnāmupāyaprajñāsupariśodhitānāṃ pratilambhānmahākaruṇābalena cātikrānto bhavati śrāvakapratyekabuddhabhūmim,
S04n292:148: tasya asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyakarma nimittāpagataṃ pravartate |
S04n292:151: prathamāyāmeva bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya apramāṇaṃ kāyavāṅmanaskarma sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhacaryāṃ samatikrāntaṃ bhavati?
S04n292:155: asyāṃ tu punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau svabuddhigocaravicārapratilambhādasaṃhāryaṃ śrāvakapratyekabuddhairbhavati |
S04n292:156: tadyathāpi nāma bhavanto jinaputrā rājakulaprasūto rājaputro rājalakṣaṇasamanvāgato jātamātra eva sarvāmātyagaṇamabhibhavati rājādhipatyena,
S04n292:158: yadā punaḥ sa saṃvṛddho bhavati tadā svabuddhibalādhānataḥ sarvāmātyakriyāsamatikrānto bhavati,
S04n292:161: asyāṃ tu saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito bodhisattvaḥ svaviṣayajñānaviśeṣamāhātmyāvasthitatvātsarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhakriyāmatikrānto bhavati ||
S04n292:162: sa khalu punarbho bodhisattvo'syāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthito gambhīrasya vivittasyāpracārasya kāyavāṅmanaskarmaṇo lābhī bhavati |
S04n292:166: vimukticandra āha - katamāṃ bhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate?
S04n292:167: vajragarbha āha - ṣaṣṭhīṃ bho jinaputra bodhisattvabhūmimupādāya bodhisattvo nirodhaṃ samāpadyate |
S04n292:168: asyāṃ punaḥ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaścittakṣaṇe cittakṣaṇe nirodhaṃ samāpadyate ca vyuttiṣṭhate ca |
S04n292:169: na ca nirodhaḥ sākṣātkṛta iti vaktavyaḥ |
S04n292:170: tena so'cintyena kāyavāṅmana skarmaṇā samanvāgata ityucyate |
S04n292:171: āścaryaṃ bho yatra hi nāma bodhisattvo bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati,
S04n292:173: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputra puruṣaḥ kuśalo mahāsāgare vārilakṣaṇābhijñaḥ paṇḍito vyakto medhāvī tatropagatayā mīmāṃsayā samanvāgato mahāsāgare mahāyānapātrābhirūḍho vahanakuśalaśca bhavati,
S04n292:176: evameva bho jinaputra asyāṃ saptamyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvaḥ sarvajñajñānamahāsāgarāvatīrṇaḥ pāramitāmahāyānapātrābhirūḍho bhūtakoṭivihāreṇa ca viharati,
S04n292:179: sa evaṃ jñānabalādhānaprāptaḥ samādhijñānabalabhāvanābhinirhṛtayā buddhyā mahatopāyaprajñābalādhānena saṃsāramukhaṃ cādarśayati |
S04n292:200: tasyaivaṃ jñānasamanvāgatasya asyāṃ saptasyāṃ dūraṃgamāyāṃ bodhisattvabhūmau sthitasya bodhisattvasya bahavo buddhā ābhāsamāgacchanti... |
S04n292:202: teṣāṃ ca sakāśādgauravacitrīkāreṇa satkṛtya dharmadeśanāṃ śṛṇoti,
S04n292:217: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ tadeva jātarūpaṃ sarvaratnapratyuptaṃ bhūyasyā mātrayottaptataraṃ bhavati,
S04n292:220: evameva bho jinaputrāḥ...tāni kuśalamūlānyupāyaprajñājñānābhinirhṛtāni bhūyasyā mātrayottaptatarāṇi bhavanti prabhāsvaratarāṇi,
S04n292:222: tadyathāpi nāma bho jinaputrāḥ sūryābhā asaṃhāryā bhavanti sarvajyotirgaṇacandrābhābhiścaturṣu mahādvīpeṣu,
S04n292:225: evameva bho jinaputrā...tāni kuśalamūlānyasaṃhāryāṇi bhavanti sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaiḥ,
S04n292:228: tasya daśabhyaḥ pāramitābhya upāyakauśalyapāramitā atiriktatamā bhavati,
S04n292:229: na ca pariśeṣā na samudāgacchati yathābalaṃ yathābhajamānam |
S04n292:230: iyaṃ bho jinaputrā bodhisattvasya dūraṃgamā nāma saptamī bodhisattvabhūmiḥ samāsanirdeśataḥ,
S04n292:231: yasyāṃ pratiṣṭhito bodhisattvo bhūyastvena vaśavartī bhavati devarājaḥ kṛtī prabhuḥ sattvānāmabhisamayajñānopasaṃhāreṣvaparyantaḥ sarvaśrāvakapratyekabuddhaparipṛcchāsu kuśalaḥ sattvānniyāmamavakrāmayitum |
